titles.title: A bill for the relief of Mr. Conwell F. Robinson and Mr. Gerald R. Robinson.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Interior Department, OMB.
Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks. Hearings held.

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Johnston without amendment. With written report No. 100-527.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 962.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests
committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources

bill.summary: 11/5/1987--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Interior to grant a life estate special use permit to two named individuals to use described property in Glacier National Park.
